ffox.bconfiguration
Class ConfigurationTest

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      ffox.bconfiguration.ConfigurationTest

public class ConfigurationTest
extends junit.framework.Assert

Test class for the Configuration tab of ComplianceVault 5.1.4 web portal. (Supervisor screen)

Since:
0.1.0
Author:
bkett

Constructor Detail

ConfigurationTest

public ConfigurationTest()
Method Detail

setUpOnce

public static void setUpOnce()
Instantiates the browser.

setUp

public void setUp()
Refresh page to root for test (Configuration tab)

testRegistration

public void testRegistration()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Register Product" link in the menu bar of the Configuration tab. This is accomplished by Asserting the existence of the header for the page and that the content matches what is displayed in Razorsafe 5.1.4. This test DOES NOT include asserting the ability to register. This is by design and will not be implemented in version 1.0.0

testEmailSettings

public void testEmailSettings()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Email Settings" link in the menu bar of the Configuration tab. This test asserts the existence of the header, the select menus, and additionally validates the displayed text matches what was posted in Razorsafe 5.1.4. The test clicks on all of the options in each select menu and checks to see if the number of options is correct. Finally, Default settings are submitted and test concludes with validating submission successful.

testUserSettings

public void testUserSettings()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Default User Settings" link in the menu bar of the Configuration tab. This test validates the existence of the header, the select menus, the spans of the menus, as well as assessing the options of each select menu (exists). Default settings are submitted and test concludes with validating submission successful.

testSetTimeNTP

public void testSetTimeNTP()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Set Date/Time" link in the menu bar of the Configuration tab. This test validates the existence of the header and the NTP Server selection radio button. Then it checks the select menus, and the spans of the menus, as well as assessing the options of each select menu for in terms of number for the generated options. A slew of invalid text is entered into the textbox. This is submitted and test concludes with validating submission successful.

testSetTimeManual

public void testSetTimeManual()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Set Date/Time" link in the menu bar of the Configuration tab. This test validates the existence of the header and the Set Time Manually radio button. A slew of invalid text is entered into the textbox. This is submitted, and the test asserts a failure dialogue. valid text is entered and the test then concludes with validating submission successful.

testSTMPServer

public void testSTMPServer()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "SMTP Server: link in the menu bar of the configuration tab. This test validates all of the features present in the supervisor as of 5.1.4, such as headers, inputs etc. This test is coupled to the Email Viewing Test Suite.

testEmailNotification

public void testEmailNotification()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Email Notification" link in the menu bar of the configuration tab.This test validates all of the features present in the supervisor as of 5.1.4, such as headers, inputs etc. This test is coupled to the SMTP Server test.

testProxyServer

public void testProxyServer()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Proxy Server" link in the menu bar of the configuration tab. This test validates all of the features present in the supervisor as of 5.1.4, such as headers, inputs etc.

testNetworkServerControl

public void testNetworkServerControl()
Tests the existence of and the functionality of the "Network Server Control" link in the menu bar of the configuration tab. This test validates all of the features present in the supervisor as of 5.1.4, such as headers, inputs etc.

testFetchers

public void testFetchers()
Creates and tests fetchers for all supported Protocols. Checks GUI page for correct text and operation of input boxes.

testLegalHolds

public void testLegalHolds()
Creates and deletes a legal hold. Checks validity of naming schemes.

testTags

public void testTags()
Creates and deletes a tag. Checks validity of naming schemes.

tearDown

public void tearDown()
Delays next test by 5 seconds.

tearDownOnce

public static void tearDownOnce()
Kills the browser.
